subject: Re: [R] importing excel-file
body:
The issue Greg mentions, that "most scientists store their  
experimental data in MS-Excel spreadsheets"
is the motivation for one of the sessions at the Interface
2007 conference
http://sbm.temple.edu/interface07/index.html
in Philadelphia, May 23-26, 2007

Erich and Thomas designed the RExcel interface.
Naras uses RExcel.  Robert uses the interface
between S-Plus and Excel.


Accessible Interfaces to Advanced Statistics Software
Richard Heiberger, organizer

Erich Neuwirth, Thomas Baier, An Office-Software
and Menu-Driven Interface for Advanced Statistics in the
Biological Sciences

Narasimhan Balasubramanian, Disseminating
Statistical Methodology and Results via R and Excel:
Two Examples

Robert Gagnon, Analysis and Visualization of
Microarray Gene Expression Data Using Excel, SAS,
and SPlus

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
